  • Changelog

Function reference

All functions

CRD()
Generates a Completely Randomized Design (CRD)
RCBD()
Generates a Randomized Complete Block Design (RCBD)
RCBD_augmented()
Generates an Augmented Randomized Complete Block Design (ARCBD)
alpha_lattice()
Generates an Alpha Design
diagonal_arrangement()
Spatial Un-replicated Diagonal Arrangement Design
full_factorial()
Generates a Full Factorial Design
incomplete_blocks()
Generates a Resolvable Incomplete Block Design
latin_square()
Generates a Latin Square Design
optimized_arrangement()
Generates an Spatial Un-replicated Optimized Arrangement Design
partially_replicated()
Generates a Spatial Partially Replicated Arrangement Design
plot(<FielDHub>)
Plot a FielDHub object
plot_layout()
Generates field layouts plots
print(<FielDHub>)
Print a FielDHub object
print(<summary.FielDHub>)
Print the summary of a FielDHub object
rectangular_lattice()
Generates a Rectangular Lattice Design.
row_column()
Generates a Resolvable Row-Column Design (RowColD)
run_app()
Run the Shiny Application
split_families()
Split a population of genotypes randomly into several locations.
split_plot()
Generates a Split Plot Design
split_split_plot()
Generates a Split Split Plot Design
square_lattice()
Generates a Square Lattice Design.
strip_plot()
Strip Plot Design
summary(<FielDHub>)
Summary a FielDHub object

Developed by Didier Murillo, Salvador Gezan.
